test.name: TC9: Contact Us Form Interaction

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Contact Us Menu Item
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the "Contact Us" menu item and verifies that the Contact Us page is opened.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Look For Existing Fields
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the following fields exist on the Contact Us page: First Name, Last Name, Email, Website, and Message.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: XPath for field first-name: xpath=//span[@class='wpcf7-form-control-wrap' and @data-name='first-name']//input | //span[@class='wpcf7-form-control-wrap' and @data-name='first-name']//textarea

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Look For Privacy Checkbox
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the Privacy Policy checkbox exists and is not selected.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Not Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is not selected/checked.
kw.msg: Verifying checkbox 'xpath=//input[@type='checkbox' and @name='acceptance-376']' is not selected.

kw.name: Look For Send Button
kw.doc: This keyword verifies that the Send button exists but is not clickable.

kw.name: Element Should Be Disabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified by ``locator`` is disabled.

kw.name: Scroll Down
kw.doc: This keyword scrolls down the page.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: window.scrollBy(0, 500) Without any arguments.

kw.name: Select Privacy Policy Checkbox
kw.doc: This keyword selects the Privacy Policy checkbox.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.

kw.name: Click Send Button
kw.doc: This keyword clicks the Send button and verifies that the error message is shown if the form is incomplete.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking button 'xpath=//input[@class='wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-submit has-spinner' and @type='submit' and @value='Send']'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.arg: ONE OR MORE FIELDS HAVE AN ERROR. PLEASE CHECK AND TRY AGAIN.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=(//div[@class='wpcf7-response-output'])[1]' contains text 'ONE OR MORE FIELDS HAVE AN ERROR. PLEASE CHECK AND TRY AGAIN.'.

kw.name: Check Error Properties
kw.doc: This keyword checks the error properties to ensure the error message is not visible.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: return window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('.wpcf7-response-output')).backgroundColor Without any arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.
kw.msg: Executing JavaScript: return window.getComputedStyle(document.querySelector('.wpcf7-response-output')).color Without any arguments.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments and ignores possible error.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Unselect Privacy Checkbox and Reload Page
kw.doc: This keyword unselects the Privacy Policy checkbox and reloads the page.

kw.name: Unselect Checkbox
kw.doc: Removes the selection of checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Not Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is not selected/checked.
kw.msg: Verifying checkbox 'xpath=//input[@type='checkbox' and @name='acceptance-376']' is not selected.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'xpath=//span[@data-name='first-name']//span[@class='wpcf7-not-valid-tip'][normalize-space()='The field is required.']'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'xpath=//span[@data-name='last-name']//span[@class='wpcf7-not-valid-tip'][normalize-space()='The field is required.']'.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text 'xpath=//span[@data-name='your-email']//span[@class='wpcf7-not-valid-tip'][normalize-space()='The field is required.']'.

kw.name: Enter 'John' for First Name
kw.doc: This keyword enters the value 'John' for the First Name field.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'John' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder='First name*']'.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Enter 'Doe' for Last Name
kw.doc: This keyword enters the value 'Doe' for the Last Name field.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Doe' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder='Last name*']'.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Enter 'john.doe.test' for Email and Click Into Message Field
kw.doc: This keyword enters an invalid email ('john.doe.test') for the Email field.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Value
kw.doc: Returns the value attribute of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Click Into Message Field
kw.doc: This keyword clicks into the message field and verifies the error for invalid email.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//span[@class='wpcf7-not-valid-tip'][normalize-space()='The e-mail address entered is invalid.']'.

kw.name: Enter 'john.doe.test@gmail.com' for Email and Click Into Message Field
kw.doc: This keyword enters a valid email ('john.doe.test@gmail.com') and verifies no error appears.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Into Message Field
kw.doc: This keyword clicks into the message field and verifies the error for invalid email.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.name: Look For Privacy Checkbox

kw.name: Element Should Be Disabled

kw.name: Click Avisto Logo
kw.doc: This keyword clicks on the Avisto logo and verifies that the homepage is opened. It checks that after clicking the logo, the browser navigates back to the homepage URL https://www.avisto-eastern.com/.

kw.name: Click Image
kw.doc: Clicks an image identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'Home < Avisto Eastern Europe'.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test case verifies the behavior of the Contact Us form, including validation errors and successful form submission.
